trans-unit.source: The 2009-04-14 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:
trans-unit.target: The 2009-04-14 version of the Azure storage services includes these changes:

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob</link> operation was introduced with the 2009-04-14 version.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="b022aff3-053b-4bd7-9ebe-3f06e7e8f801" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Blob</link> operation was introduced with the 2009-04-14 version.

trans-unit.source: To call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, you must specify the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> header.
trans-unit.target: To call <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>, you must specify the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> header.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="608f2eb2-c3b6-4c23-98d2-64c99f5a3c98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Block List</link> operation offers new functionality with the 2009-04-14 version.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="608f2eb2-c3b6-4c23-98d2-64c99f5a3c98" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Block List</link> operation offers new functionality with the 2009-04-14 version.

trans-unit.source: You can now specify whether you wish to return the list of committed blocks, the list of uncommitted blocks, or both lists together.
trans-unit.target: You can now specify whether you wish to return the list of committed blocks, the list of uncommitted blocks, or both lists together.

trans-unit.source: To use this new functionality, you must set the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> request header to 2009-04-14.
trans-unit.target: To use this new functionality, you must set the <parameterReference>x-ms-version</parameterReference> request header to 2009-04-14.

trans-unit.source: Entity group transactions permit atomic batch operations for multiple insert, update, and delete operations against the 2009-04-14 version of the Table service.
trans-unit.target: Entity group transactions permit atomic batch operations for multiple insert, update, and delete operations against the 2009-04-14 version of the Table service.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.

trans-unit.source: The Table service no longer supports property names, including the dash (-) character in the 2009-04-14 version.
trans-unit.target: The Table service no longer supports property names, including the dash (-) character in the 2009-04-14 version.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the 2009-04-14 version, the Table service now supports naming properties with C# Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Beginning with the 2009-04-14 version, the Table service now supports naming properties with C# Unicode characters.

trans-unit.source: For more information about naming properties, see <link xlink:href="01f78ed1-9cbd-4b00-8113-71129751357e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding the Table Service Data Model</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about naming properties, see <link xlink:href="01f78ed1-9cbd-4b00-8113-71129751357e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Understanding the Table Service Data Model</link>.
